titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Henry J. Acker papers, 1864
titlestmt.author: Processed by: Rubenstein Staff; EAD finding aid derived from MARC record using marc2ead_sectionA.xsl

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid derived from MARC record via marc2ead_sectionA.xsl December 2016

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University

did.abstract: A printed pamphlet entitled GULF SPY, which includes a fanciful story of spying on Confederate fortifications at Mobile, AL, and an essay about the presidential election of 1864; the manuscript from which the pamphlet was printed; and a photocopy from the National Archives of Acker's service record with the 23rd Wisconsin Infantry.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48 hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the Rubenstein to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

prefercite.p: Henry J. Acker papers, 1864, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.p: Finding aid derived from MARC record using MARC2EAD-SecA.xsl, December 2016

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: A printed pamphlet entitled GULF SPY, which includes a fanciful story of spying on Confederate fortifications at Mobile, AL, and an essay about the presidential election of 1864; the manuscript from which the pamphlet was printed; and a photocopy from the National Archives of Acker's service record with the 23rd Wisconsin Infantry.
